pr_title: [FLINK-20673][table-planner-blink] ExecNode#getOutputType method should return LogicalType instead of RowType

timeline.bodyText: You can link to JavaDoc of RowData for a mapping of logical types to internal data structures here.
timeline.author: twalthr

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/flink/table/planner/plan/nodes/exec/ExecNode.java b/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/flink/table/planner/plan/nodes/exec/ExecNode.java index 25132e2e109..536b0a69348 100644 --- a/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/flink/table/planner/plan/nodes/exec/ExecNode.java +++ b/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/flink/table/planner/plan/nodes/exec/ExecNode.java @@ -43,7 +45,10 @@ public interface ExecNode { /** * Returns the output {@link LogicalType} of this node, * this type should be consistent with the type parameter {@link T}. - * Such as, T is RowData, the output type should be RowType. + * + *

Such as, if T is {@link RowData}, the output type should be {@link RowType}. + * please refer to the JavaDoc of {@link RowData} for more info about + * mapping of logical types to internal data structures. */ LogicalType getOutputType();

timeline.message: [FLINK-20673][table-planner-blink] ExecNode#getOutputType method should return LogicalType instead of RowType
